title: The Day Her Heart Stood Still
description: Exclusive FREE read for newsletter subscribersWhen you wish upon a star…Ready to give up on ever finding “Mr. Right”, astronaut Andie Del Sarto makes a wish on a shooting star. Except the shooting star isn’t a meteorite at all. It’s a spaceship carrying an alien hunk of a galactic explorer named Zefer—and she’s just brought him down to Earth. . .
author: Susan Grant
